abstract: Jennifer Granholm, the former Michigan governor, will begin hosting a progressive prime-time program on Current TV in January.
snippet: Jennifer Granholm, the former Michigan governor, will begin hosting a progressive prime-time program on Current TV in January.
lead_paragraph: Jennifer Granholm, the former Michigan governor, will soon become the third host of a progressive prime-time program on Current TV, the fledgling competitor of MSNBC.

headline.main: Current TV Adds 'The War Room' to Its Lineup
